page.title: 14VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: The{Village Hall}has a very active committee. Regular activities include the youth club, badmington, bowls, snooker, bingo, and there is a reading room with daily newspapers. Dances, wedding receptions, whist and domino drives, parties take place in a large upstairs hall, which has excellent kitchen and bar facilities. An{Exhibition}is held annually for three weekends in August. It includes items of historical interest, local crafts, stalls and refreshments. The{Age Concern}have a luncheon and tea club every Wednesday, and a tea dance fortnightly. A trip and party are arranged in the summer. The Village Hall gives a Christmas Party. {Women's Institute}meets monthly (membership about 30) in the Parish Hall, where the{Brownies}also meet. 2{pool teams}play in the public house.
